content: विधिः [विधा-कि] {@--1@} Doing, performance, practice, an act or action; ब्रह्मध्यानाभ्यसनविधिना योगनिद्रां गतस्य <ls>Bh. 3. 41</ls>; योगविधि <ls>R. 8. 22</ls>; अस्याः सर्गविधौ <ls>V. 1. 8</ls>; लेत्वाविधि <ls>Māl. 1. 35.</ls> {@--2@} Method, manner, way, means, mode; <ls>Pt. 1. 376.</ls> {@--3@} A rule, commandment, any precept which enjoins something for the first time (as distinguished from नियम and परिसंख्या q. <ab>q. v.</ab> v.); विधिरत्यंतमप्राप्तौ; चि कीर्षाकृतिसाध्यत्वहेतुधीविषयो विधिः, वहति विधिहुतं या हविः <ls>Ś. 1. 1.</ls> {@--4@} A sacred precept or rule, ordinance, injunction, law, a sacred command, religious commandment (<ab>opp.</ab> अर्थवाद which means ‘an explanatory statement coupled with legends and illustrations’; see अर्थवाद); प्रवृत्तिपरं वाक्यं विधिः, as ज्योतिष्टोमेन स्वर्गकामो यजेत; श्रद्धा वित्तं विधिश्चेति त्रितयं तत्समागतं <ls>Ś. 7. 29</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 16.</ls> {@--5@} Any religious act or ceremony, a rite, ceremony; स चेत् स्वयं कर्मसु धर्मचारिणां त्वमंतरायो भवसि च्युतो विधिः <ls>R. 3. 45</ls>, <ls n="R.">1. 34.</ls> {@--6@} Behaviour, conduct. {@--7@} Condition; <ls>V. 4.</ls> {@--8@} Creation, formation; सामग्र्यविधौ <ls>Ku. 3. 28</ls>; कल्याणी विधिषु विचित्रता विधातुः <ls>Ki. 7. 7.</ls> {@--9@} The creator. {@--10@} Fate, destiny, luck; विधौ वामारंभे मन समुचितैषा परिणतिः <ls>Māl. 4. 4.</ls> {@--11@} The food of elephants. {@--12@} Time. {@--13@} A physician. {@--14@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
